name: FinDeck.io
description: Contains Internet Computer canister code for FinDeck.io | A FinDeckDao Project

scripts.build: cd src/frontend && VITE_CANISTER_ORIGIN=http://$(dfx canister id backend).localhost:8000 vite build
scripts.postdeploy:local: echo UI: http://$(dfx canister id backend).localhost:8000
scripts.serve: cd src/frontend && VITE_CANISTER_ORIGIN=http://$(dfx canister id backend).localhost:8000 vite
